content.rendered:
Paris RE Made Spring-Summer 2024 Edition "In Alignment"

elieving in your beliefs.

Standing up for it.

Being an individual in a community that you believe in.

That is what PRM stands for.

We are who we are. No matter what.

Paris RE Made Spring Summer 2024 "In Alignment" is a testament to embracing authenticity and self-expression.

It encourages individuals to celebrate their unique identities and choose the highest version of themselves, irrespective of external influences

Every piece in this collection is designed to reflect the individuality of the wearer. *

Every piece we create , we put thoughts and our beliefs in it. Sharing it with you and letting you contribute to our community is what matters the most at PRM.

"In Alignment"

isn't just about wearing clothes; it's about living your truth fearlessly. The collection includes a range of styles that reflect diverse tastes and preferences, ensuring everyone can find a piece that resonates with their authentic self.

Looks

Photo: Press Paris RE Made

More on: @parisremade


By Senior Fashion Editor 24FashionTV: Christina V Henningstad @christina_henningstad
